definitions.definition: The common name for the monetary currencies used in modern India , Mauritius , Nepal , Pakistan , the Seychelles , or Sri Lanka .
A silver coin circulating in India between the 16th and 20th centuries, weighing one tola (formerly 170–180 troy grains ; from 1833, 180 troy grains).

main_definition: The common name for the monetary currencies used in modern India , Mauritius , Nepal , Pakistan , the Seychelles , or Sri Lanka .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A silver coin circulating in India between the 16th and 20th centuries, weighing one tola (formerly 170–180 troy grains ; from 1833, 180 troy grains).
( video games ) The primary currency of Hyrule .
